name: picCorr
script:
# get x and y data with names

x <- table[,ind_variable]
names(x) <- rownames(table)
y <- table[,dep_variable]
names(y) <- rownames(table)

# calculate independent contrasts

picX <- pic(x, tree)
picY <- pic(y, tree)

# run regression forced through the origin

res <- lm(picY~picX-1)
output <- anova(res)


# coerce into table
tableResults<-as.matrix(cbind(output[,1:5]))
# tableResults are the final results
